cast.name: 托马斯·施图伯 Thomas Stuber

writer.name: 卡特娅·费梅尔 Katja Feldmeier

director.name: 朱利叶斯·费梅尔 Julius Feldmeier
卡特娅·费梅尔 Katja Feldmeier

introduction: 卡佳和朱利叶斯·费尔德迈尔的纪录片《6Minuten66》（6分钟66）已被邀请参加柏林电影节的透视德国电影单元。在这部电影中，15位导演探讨了电影是否会因位置、艺术形式和Lan而逐渐消失的问题。他们的回答也将被视为在奥迪柏林休息室的“雷登•伯电影”（“谈论电影”）小组讨论这些问题的机会。Katja and Julius Feldmeier’s documentary interview film 6Minuten66 (6Minutes66) (prod: triebwerk films, Ludwigsburg) has been invited to participate as a guest in Perspektive Deutsches Kino. In the film, 15 directors (Dietrich Brüggemann, Nikias Chryssos, Katrin Gebbe, Helene Hegemann, Sonja Heiss, Cüneyt Kaya, Laura Lackmann, Jakob Lass, Tom Lass, Burhan Qurbani, Axel Ranisch, Christian Schwochow, Mia Spengler, Thomas Stuber, Tini Tüllmann) explore the question of whether the cinema is dying out as a location, an art form, and language. Their responses will also be taken as an occasion to discuss these issues at a “Reden über Film” (“Talking about Film”) panel in the Audi Berlinale Lounge.
